meanings.sent1: The hungry child wolfs down his dinner every night.
meanings.sent2: She wolfs her favorite chocolate cake whenever she feels sad.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon wolfs the stolen cookies before getting caught.
meanings.sent4: Time wolfs away our youth, leaving memories in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The competitive eater wolfs down hot dogs at an incredible speed.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the noun 'wolf'.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, we saw two wolfs howling at the moon.
meanings.sent2: The pack of wolfs traveled together in search of food.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy toy wolfs on the shelf looked quite adorable.
meanings.sent4: The lone wolf stood out among the group of wolfs.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful scene with a family of wolfs in the snow.
